entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Barrhead
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 10.
